name: purescript-webaudio
description: A PureScript wrapper for the HTML5 Web Audio API

scripts.Test01: cp test/Test01.purs src/ && pulp browserify -m Test01 --optimise --to html/test01.js && rm src/Test01.purs
scripts.Test02: cp test/Test02.purs src/ && pulp browserify -m Test02 --optimise --to html/test02.js && rm src/Test02.purs
